subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: Rj

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I don't think you can really say they "give off sound": they can cause soun=
d, and maybe that's what you meant by a secondary phenomenon.=A0 But, gravi=
ty can cause sound also as a secondary phenomenon (if it pulls an apple off=
 a tree and its hits your head), and far infrared EM radiation can cause so=
und as a secondary phenomenon (if it heats something to burning or boiling)=
, and microwave frequencies can cause sound as a secondary phenomenon (as w=
hen popcorn pops).=A0 So about anything can cause sound as a secondary phen=
omenon.



--- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostres=
earch.com> wrote:

com>

    =
  
      


Right...gotcha. Sound is a bi-product more 
or less.
=A0

an give off sound 
        but only as a secondary phenomenon. It sounds li=
ke a low hum to some 
        people! I believe the most famous of these ph=
enomenon was caused by 
        HAARP.

 to get my mind around it.

nal Message -----

  =
              April, standard physics today defines four 
                 =
 fundamental types of forces: electromagnetism, gravity,=A0 
              =
    and the strong and weak interaction of elementary 
                  pa=
rticles.=A0 So while EM is one type of energy (well, lets 
                =
  call it a force), there are a few others too.

s seems to jive with

 I am still not certain I

                            Tell me w=
here the seperation on the spectrum 
                            takes plac=
e between 300Hz and 300KHz. Yes, 
                            soundwaves ca=
use pressure waves that our ears read 
                            as vibra=
tion and our mind translates as sound. The 
                            wav=
es are still on the electromagnetic spectrum. 
                            =
Even subsonic geomagnetic waves are present on the 
                       =
     scale. What I mean by power can be directll 
                         =
   translated to volume or amplitude. The only thing 
                     =
       that distinguishes soundwaves from any other wave is 
              =
              the fact that we can hear them.
                            =
=A0
                            Frank R.

            =
                  
                              
                         =
     
                                
                                
   =
                             No. Sounds waves are not on the 
             =
                   electromagnet spectrum nor are they a form of 
         =
                       electromagnet energy. Sound waves are based on 
    =
                            pressure waves in the air (or in other 
       =
                         substances).=A0 Our ears detect these 
           =
                     pressure waves and translate them into sounds we 
    =
                            here.=A0 Our ear do NOT hear electromagnet 
   =
                             energy.=A0 Our eyes do: that part which we 
  =
                              call visible light.



--- On

                              =
  
                                
                                
      =
                          
                                
               =
                 
                                
                        =
        It sounds like she's saying "one, two, 
                           =
     ....."
                                =A0
                           =
     A mistake that a lot of people make is 
                              =
  thinking that there are two different types of 
                         =
       energy at work when it comes to sound waves and 
                   =
             electromagnetic waves. The only thing that 
                  =
              seperates them is frequency and power. Radio 
               =
                 waves are radio waves because they occupy a 
             =
                   certain block of the electromagnietic spectrum. 
       =
                         Sound waves exist on that same spectrum just 
    =
                            farther down with much longer waves. Soundwaves=
 
                                and subsonic waves can penetrate almost a=
nything 
                                because of their wavelengths. The =
shorter the 
                                wavelength the more ways we ca=
n shield against 
                                them.
                   =
             =A0
                                Think of microwaves. These=
 are also a type 
                                of radio and telemetry tr=
ansmitting wave but the 
                                waves also have a =
physical effect on our 
                                environment by caus=
ing molecules to speed up, 
                                which creates h=
eat. A little lower than this is 
                                IR or inf=
rared it too can cause physical objects 
                                to=
 heat up but usually it just causes molecules 
                            =
    to rotate in place. All physical things give off 
                     =
           IR light. Its a way the total system conserves 
                =
                energy by spontaneously emitting IR 
                      =
          radiation.
                                =A0
                  =
              Frank R.

                        =
        Here is some 
                                food for thought. I a=
m currently reviewing my 
                                audio from our Ma=
y 30th 
                                investigation.
                    =
            =A0
                                It was me 
                =
                and another girl teammate=A0present in the 
               =
                 room. I picked up a 3rd female voice on my 
              =
                  digital voice recorder that I carry with me. We 
        =
                        were standing right next to another digital 
      =
                          video recorder that I leave beside my night 
    =
                            vision camera. That recorder did not pick up 
 =
                               this 3rd voice. I have asked the girl that w=
as 
                                with me to check her recording to see i=
f she 
                                picked it up.
                      =
          =A0
                                I have long 
                =
                felt the true EVP does not come from sound waves 
         =
                       in the environment, or then it wouldn't be EVP, 
   =
                             but a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are 
  =
                              appearing directly on the 
                  =
              recordings.
                                =A0
             =
                   This 
                                instance with the =
recorders may back that theory 
                                up. That ot=
her recorder should have picked that 
                                voice=
 up if it were sound waves in the 
                                environm=
ent.
                                =A0
                                I =
am 
                                attaching the clip of this 3rd voice. 
=
                                The=A0file that is named=A0"01-02-17 Clip" =

                                is the full clip.=A0You will hear my voice=
 as 
                                I say "Yeah", and then another comes i=
n right 
                                after that. I think I know what it=
 
                                says.
                                =A0=

                                Again, I was 
                            =
    live monitoring my audio, but still did not hear 
                     =
           this until playback. It isn't clear, so I am not 
              =
                  as excited about it as my one's from the last 
          =
                      investigation.
                                =A0
  =
                              =A0
                                
        =

                                Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                                From: 
                        =
        Frank Ratka 

                                To: 
                =

ay, June 08, 2009 1:09 PM

                          =
      

                                
                                
 =
                               
                                
          =
                      
                                
                   =
             I have a running theory that EVP is carried 
                 =
               on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly 
             =
                   where they want it to manifest. It works off the 
      =
                          heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic 
=
                                waves that differ one another in frequency =
then 
                                if you add or subtract them together =
you get a 
                                beat frequency or alternate freq=
uency. For 
                                example, if a ghost is sending =
a signal at 54KHz 
                                and you have an electric=
 fan in a room creating 
                                an untrasonic freq=
uency at 45KHz then you will 
                                have a interm=
ediate difference=A0frequency at 
                                9KHz, wel=
l within human hearing range (20Hz to 
                                20KH=
z). This was just an example, but all 
                                elec=
tronic equipment generates ultrasonic 
                                sign=
als just by turning them on. From this 
                                the=
ory I always felt that EVP were generated 
                                =
within a few inches of the recorder.
                                =A0
  =
                              We are able to reproduce this affect in not 
=
                                only radio with superheterodyne systems but=
 also 
                                with acoustics and audio as in some =
passive 
                                sonars and a commercial produce ca=
lled the 
                                "audio spotlight" by Dr. Joseph P=
ompeii.
                                =A0
                               =
 Frank R.

                                I am curious if anyone with a micropho=
ne 
                                wired to a remote site has ever gotten =
any EVP 
                                in real time.
                    =
            =A0
                                I=A0took part in=A0an inves=
tigation 
                                of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore =
IL, on Saturday 
                                night. We had six video ca=
meras set up in the 
                                three halls of the bui=
lding. The video for 
                                all=A0was being monit=
ored and 
                                recorded=A0at a central location.=
 Alas, we 
                                did not have microphones at the =
camera sites 
                                conected to the central locat=
ion. I wonder what 
                                we might have heard if =
we did?

                            <div>Tell me where the seperation on the spect=

tic spectrum.

are present on the

tude. The only thing

aves from any other wave is

an hear them.</div>

                                <td valign=3D"top">No. Sounds waves ar=
e not on the

e they a form of 
                                electromagnet energy. Sou=
nd waves are based on

e air (or in other 
                                substances).  Our =
ears detect these 
                                pressure waves and trans=
late them into sounds we 
                                here.  Our e=
ar do NOT hear electromagnet 
                                energy. =
 Our eyes do: that part which we

ble light.<br><br><br><br>--- On

ust: inherit;" valign=3D"top">

                      =
          <div>A mistake that a lot of people make is 
                    =
            thinking that there are two different types of 
               =
                 energy at work when it comes to sound waves and 
         =
                       electromagnetic waves. The only thing that 
        =
                        seperates them is frequency and power. Radio 
     =
                           waves are radio waves because they occupy a 
   =
                             certain block of the electromagnietic spectrum=
. 
                                Sound waves exist on that same spectrum =
just 
                                farther down with much longer waves. =
Soundwaves 
                                and subsonic waves can penetrat=
e almost anything 
                                because of their wavelen=
gths. The shorter the 
                                wavelength the more =
ways we can shield against 
                                them.</div>
   =
                             <div> </div>
                            =
    <div>Think of microwaves. These are also a type 
                      =
          of radio and telemetry transmitting wave but the 
               =
                 waves also have a physical effect on our 
                =
                environment by causing molecules to speed up, 
            =
                    which creates heat. A little lower than this is 
      =
                          IR or infrared it too can cause physical objects =

                                to heat up but usually it just causes mole=
cules 
                                to rotate in place. All physical thi=
ngs give off 
                                IR light. Its a way the total=
 system conserves 
                                energy by spontaneously =
emitting IR 
                                radiation.</div>

                              <td valign=3D"top">
                         =
       <div>I have a running theory that EVP is carried 
                  =
              on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly 
              =
                  where they want it to manifest. It works off the 
       =
                         heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic 
 =
                               waves that differ one another in frequency t=
hen 
                                if you add or subtract them together y=
ou get a 
                                beat frequency or alternate frequ=
ency. For 
                                example, if a ghost is sending a=
 signal at 54KHz 
                                and you have an electric =
fan in a room creating 
                                an untrasonic frequ=
ency at 45KHz then you will 
                                have a interme=
diate difference frequency at 
                                9KHz, w=
ell within human hearing range (20Hz to 
                                20=
KHz). This was just an example, but all 
                                el=
ectronic equipment generates ultrasonic 
                                si=
gnals just by turning them on. From this 
                                t=
heory I always felt that EVP were generated 
                              =
  within a few inches of the recorder.</div>
                              =
  <div> </div>
                                <div>We are able to rep=
roduce this affect in not 
                                only radio with =
superheterodyne systems but also 
                                with acou=
stics and audio as in some passive 
                                sonars =
and a commercial produce called the 
                                "audio=
 spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.</div>
                                <d=
iv> </div>
